00017 using std::endl;

00019 using tranSupport::softEquiv;
00020 using tranSupport::hasNoZeros;
00021 using tranSupport::hasNoNegatives;
00022 
00023 typedef std::vector<double> doubleVec;
00024 typedef std::vector< doubleVec > doubleTwoDVec;
00025 
00026 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00027    TESTER_INIT("VecComp");
00028 
00029    // ===== check just regular double equivalence ===== //
00030    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(!softEquiv(1.0, 0.0));
00031 
00032    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(!softEquiv(50.0, 50.00001, 1e-7));
00033 
00034    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(-3.14159, -3.14159));
00035 
00036    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(0.0, 0.0));
00037    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(100.1, 100.0, 0.01));
00038 
00039    double someNumber = 12.0;
00040    someNumber /= 3; //4
00041    someNumber += 2; //6
00042    someNumber /= 2; //3
00043    someNumber *= 1.5; //4.5
00044 
00045    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(someNumber, 4.5));
00046 
00047    // ===== check vector of doubles ===== //
00048    doubleVec targetOneD(3), referenceOneD(3);
00049 
00050    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00051       targetOneD[i]    = i + 1.5;
00052 
00053       referenceOneD[i] = i * 2.0;
00054       referenceOneD[i] += 3.0;
00055       referenceOneD[i] /= 2.0;
00056    }
00057 
00058    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(targetOneD, referenceOneD));
00059 
00060    // ===== check vector of vector of doubles ===== //
00061    doubleTwoDVec targetTwoD(4), referenceTwoD(4);
00062 
00063    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00064       targetTwoD[i].resize(3);
00065       referenceTwoD[i].resize(3);
00066       for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00067          targetTwoD[i][j] = 0.1 + i + 3.0*j;
00068 
00069          referenceTwoD[i][j] = 0.2 + 2.0*i + 1.0;
00070          referenceTwoD[i][j] += 6.0 * j;
00071          referenceTwoD[i][j] /= 2.0;
00072          referenceTwoD[i][j] -= 0.5;
00073 
00074 //         cout   << setw(4) << i << setw(4) << j
00075 //               << setw(10) << targetTwoD[i][j]
00076 //               << setw(10) <<   referenceTwoD[i][j] << endl;
00077       }
00078    }
00079    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(targetTwoD, referenceTwoD));
00080    
00081    // ===== make sure it catches an error ===== //
00082    targetTwoD[2][2] = 99.1;
00083 
00084    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(!softEquiv(targetTwoD, referenceTwoD));
00085       
00086    // ===== try our checkzeroes ===== //
00087    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(hasNoZeros(targetTwoD));
00088    targetTwoD[2][1] = 0;
00089 
00090    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(!hasNoZeros(targetTwoD));
00091       
00092    // ===== try our nonnegative ===== //
00093    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(hasNoNegatives(targetTwoD));
00094    targetTwoD[3][2] = -10.0;
00095 
00096    TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(!hasNoNegatives(targetTwoD));
00097    
00098 
00099 
00100    TESTER_PRINTRESULT();
00101    
00102    return 0;
00103 }
